roleset.name: try, attempt

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Sotheby 's , the auction house founded in London 1744 and now under the umbrella of Sotheby 's Holdings Inc. , was hoping to stir up interest in old masters as it strove to build its U.S. business .

example.name: nominal rel: striving
example.text: But in his striving to overcome his victim , we see his cowardice again .

roleset.note: STRIVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'strive' based on sentences in financial subcorpus; nominal 'striving' based on BOLT-7. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'try'. (from strive.01-v)
STRIVING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from striving.01-n)
